scripts.build2: google-closure-compiler --charset UTF-8 --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --warning_level VERBOSE --language_out ECMASCRIPT_2015 --externs closure/forge-extern.js --externs closure/zb-externs.js --js src/js/worker-const.js --js src/js/worker.js --define FOROUTPUT --js_output_file public/worker.js
